title: Optimization of batch and packed-bed column Cr(VI) adsorption of an amine-rich chitosan/polyethyleneimine composite: application in electroplating wastewater treatment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1572-1585
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00123K, Paper
Ali Ansari, Raynara Maria Silva Jacovone, Enrico Tapire Nadres, Minh Đỗ, Debora Frigi Rodrigues
A chemically and mechanically durable polymer composite to efficiently remove chromium from water with complicated chemistry in batch and column.
